title: Monsters Among Us (MAU) Website
body:
* Redesigned Monsters Among Us, a non-profit organisation that combats systemic violence against children in Malaysia through youth-led child rights advocacy. 
* Handled the end-to-end process including the design, translating it into front-end code, integrating it with the content management system (CMS), and deploying it. 
* Also project managed the entire project and worked with a junior engineer
* Built with NuxtJS, TailwindCSS powered by Netlify CMS.

![](/img/screen-shot-2022-08-29-at-3.50.05-pm.png)

![](/img/screen-shot-2022-08-29-at-3.49.34-pm.png)
description: Commissioned by MAU, I was tasked to redesign their website from the ground up, from creating the design in Figma, coding it up using Nuxt, and deploying it on Netlify
